page.title: 02HOUSING
page.content: There are five small housing estates among the dwellings in the area, and application has been made for a small development of l2 more houses to be built just off High Street. The l98l National Census showed 328 dwellings in Steeple Ashton, of which 64 were Council Houses, many of which have since been purchased by their tenants, while privately owned houses numbered 264 of which 230 were owner occupied and 34 rented or tied cottages. Much of Steeple Ashton is designated as a Conservation Area. In recent years most new property has tended to be of the 'executive type'. There is very little family priced housing; this means that local young people when they marry move into nearby towns where there are homes for 'first time' buyers.
